title: Beaked whales feed at various depths

content.question:
Beaked whales feed at various depths, but they
 defecate at the oceanâ€™s surface. Nitrogen-rich
 whale feces deposited in surface waters supply
 nutrients for algae that are eaten by surface dwelling
 fish. Which of the following best
 predicts what would happen if the whale
 population decreased?

choices.label:
There would be a reduction in surface
 nitrogen concentration, which would cause
 an algal bloom.

The surface fish populations would decline
 due to reduced populations of algae.

The remaining whales would accumulate
 mutations at a faster rate.

The remaining whales would be forced to
 forage in the deepest parts of the ocean.

content.answer:
The surface fish populations would decline
 due to reduced populations of algae.

skill.text: 6.E: Predict the causes or effects of a change in, or disruption to, one or more components in a biological system.
